TopicTitle: Remove the checks required to get in and out of doors

Articles.Content: I think the collision checks that prevent players from doing much of anything are a complete drag on the game.  They bring nothing at all and are an example of developers forcing realism without giving the player any actual tools for realism.  An example of artificial difficulty.  If the doors are blocked why do I not have a torch?  Why do I not know what is blocking it?  Why is something blocking it a long way away from the door?  Why can I not move the door around to design the vehicle I like?
At a minimum, they should provide a check for this in the "engineers report"
